attributes.long-description:
Play in the best theme park ever... yours! The sequel to the #1 original family game of 2006 amps up the fun with over the top Whoa Coasters. Build and ride creations that can only happen in Thrillville®. Crash ‘em and cause a little mayhem if that’s your thing! Play over 30 carnival and arcade games, with 14 all new ones. You can even talk to all your park guests and try to solve a mystery together.

Welcome to Thrillville®, the park of your wildest screams!

A minimum 742 MB of disk space is required.

LucasArts and the LucasArts logo are trademarks of Lucasfilm Ltd. in the United States and/or other countries. © 2006, 2007 Lucasfilm Entertainment Company Ltd. and Frontier Developments Ltd. All rights reserved.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Thrillville®: Off the Rails
